sentences.sContent: These documents have no legal status in Britain.
sentences.sCn: 这些文件在英国并无法律效力。

sentences.sContent: What is your marital status (= are you married or not ) ?
...There's little doubt that nearly everyone who comes in contact with the net has difficulty concentration than it takes to post a status update...
...Terrie Moffitt's paper on the link between childhood self-control and adult status decades later is published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences...
...it does seem improbable that the painting's unique status can be attributed entirely to the quality of its brushstrokes...
...Craft work has higher status in nations like Germany...

synos.tran: 地位；状态；情形；重要身分

trans.tranCn: 地位， 身份； 情形， 状况
trans.tranOther: the official legal position or condition of a person, group, country etc
